section.title: The project/properties.xml File
section.p: This is where you set the properties of your project. These are imported and usable as Ant properties by all build files. Basic properties that are useful are described below.
The first node after the root properties node is the build node. it contains properties for the compiler.
Ant behaves automatically according to compiler.x properties. See the Ant manual for an explanation. Some of the compiler tag's attributes are:

ul.li: optimize - set the optimize flag for the compiler

section.p: centipede/tools/cents node contains configuration options for centipede cents. The first node under the tools node is the cents node. Its repository property tells Centipede where to download the defined cents if they are not available locally. The default krysalis repository is here.
Each cent to use is defined as a chil element of this node.
All children of these nodes are properties used by the relative cent.
